page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: The village has a First and a Middle School which were built in 1977. {The First School}has 94 pupils aged between 4 and 8 years. There are four teachers including the Headmistress. Attached to the school is apool where the children from both schools have swimming lessons. {The Middle School }has 123 pupils between the ages of 8 and 12 years. It has eight open plan classrooms, a Library and a Homecraft room for sewing and cookery. There are 9 teachers including the Headmistress. The lunches for the First and Middle schools are cooked here although some children bring their own sandwiches. {The older children}catch a bus to attend the High School in Swaffham which is 3 miles away. They leave there at the age of sixteen.
